      • registerRequestFilter

        public org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerRequestFilter(RequestFilter requestFilter)
        Register a request filter.
        Parameters:
        requestFilter - The request filter to be registered.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration to the FilterManager.

        Register a response filter.
        Parameters:
        responseFilter - The response filter to be registered.
